item.description:
Crow Hill is likely the best climbing in MA. Plenty of routes and a 90 foot tall wall in spots. You can lead here too (at your own risk.)

We will start early and climb about 3 hours.

We will meet for car pooling at 8:30 AM (sorry it's early - but I got to work in the eve.)
Meet at the Big red wind mill sculpture at Porter Square T stop. Be on time.

Directions to Crow Hill. Find Leominster State Forest (www.state.ma.us/dem/parks/lmsf.htm). Take route 2 to rt 31 south (exit 28) go south 1.3 miles to park head quarters. (get free climbing permit.) There are two Parking lots. Go to the second parking lot on the left. You will see picknick tables... I wiill be in this Parking Lot at 9:30 AM. (Look for my small Silver Toyota.)
item.name: Crow Hill, top roping
